name: ITWband Guitar Fire
description:
Come warm your fingers to the 10 original guitar songs from French rock band Into The Wild !

You compete against other players to be the best in the world rankings.

Lots of new features on this new version of our famous guitar game :

- X2 bonus points
- Slow motion mode

- The ITWband Guitar Fire shop

And always the famous fury mode will allow you to be the best at this guitar game !

Available on playstore : https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.fuzz1.itwband

Website : https://usporty-app.com/itwband/

Music : https://itwband.com/

Follow us on :

Facebook : https://www.facebook.com/ItwBandGuitarFire

Instagram : https://www.instagram.com/itwbandguitarfire

Twitter : https://www.twitter.com/ITWbandGF

YouTube : https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCvZroS0REBrH8YrrQDw6bVQ
